trans-unit.source: <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ video.publishedAt | myFromNow }}"/> - <x id="INTERPOLATION_1" equiv-text="{{ video.views | myNumberFormatter }}"/> views
or create an account on another instance
User registration is not allowed on this instance, but you can register on many others!
Send me an email to reset my password
Welcome to the <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ instanceName }}"/> instance
this instance provides a baseline quota of <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ userVideoQuota | bytes: 0 }}"/> space for the videos of its users.
this instance provides unlimited space for the videos of its users.
User registration is currently not allowed.

PeerTube uses the BitTorrent protocol to share bandwidth between users. It implies that your public IP address is stored in the public BitTorrent tracker of the video PeerTube instance as long as you're watching the video. If you want to keep your public IP address private, please use a VPN or Tor.
Policy on videos containing sensitive content
With Do not list or Blur thumbnails, a confirmation will be requested to watch the video.
Indicates the Twitter account for the website or platform on which the content was published.

If your instance is whitelisted by Twitter, a video player will be embedded in the Twitter feed on PeerTube video share.
If the instance is not whitelisted, we use an image link card that will redirect on your PeerTube instance.

Check this checkbox, save the configuration and test with a video URL of your instance (https://example.com/videos/watch/blabla) on https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator to see if you instance is whitelisted.
Previews are not federated. We fetch them directly from the origin instance and cache them.

Write directly JavaScript code.
Example: 
console.log('my instance is amazing');

Write directly CSS code. Example:
    body 
      background-color: red;
Prepend with #custom-css to override styles. Example: 
    #custom-css .logged-in-email 
      color: red;
It seems that you are not on a HTTPS server. Your webserver needs to have TLS activated in order to follow servers.

Transcoding is enabled on server. The video quota only take in account <x id="START_TAG_STRONG" ctype="x-strong" equiv-text="<strong>"/>original video. At most, this user could use ~ <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ computeQuotaWithTranscoding() | bytes: 0 }}"/>.
(extensions: <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ avatarExtensions }}"/>, max size: <x id="INTERPOLATION_1" equiv-text="{{ maxAvatarSize | bytes }}"/>)
<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ video.createdAt | myFromNow }}"/> - <x id="INTERPOLATION_1" equiv-text="{{ video.views | myNumberFormatter }}"/> views

Short text to tell people how they can support your channel (membership platform...).

When you will upload a video in this channel, the video support field will be automatically filled by this text.
Default policy on videos containing sensitive content
Sorry, but we couldn't find the page you were looking for.
Publish will be available when upload is finished
Video descriptions are truncated by default and require manual action to expand them.
This video contains mature or explicit content
Some instances do not list NSFW videos by default.
Short text to tell people how they can support you (membership platform...).
(extensions: <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ videoImageExtensions }}"/>, max size: <x id="INTERPOLATION_1" equiv-text="{{ maxVideoImageSize | bytes }}"/>)
The url is not secured (no HTTPS), so the embed video won't work on HTTPS websites (web browsers block non secured HTTP requests on HTTPS websites).
<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ video.publishedAt | myFromNow }}"/> - <x id="INTERPOLATION_1" equiv-text="{{ video.views | myNumberFormatter }}"/> views

You can subscribe to this account via any ActivityPub-capable fediverse instance. For instance with Mastodon or Pleroma you can type in the search box @@ and subscribe there. Subscription as a PeerTube user is being worked on in #470.
The sharing system used by this video implies that some technical information about your system (such as a public IP address) can be accessed publicly.

You can either comment on the page of your instance where this video is federated with your PeerTube account, or via any ActivityPub-capable fediverse instance. For instance with Mastodon or Pleroma you can type in the search box @@ and find back the video. Direct commenting capabilities are being worked on in #224.
View all <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ comment.totalReplies }}"/> replies
You set custom <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ customizationsText }}"/>.
This could lead to security issues or bugs if you do not understand it.
Are you sure you want to update the configuration?
Please type "I understand the <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ customizationsText }}"/> I set" to confirm.
I understand the <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ customizationsText }}"/> I set
<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ host }}"/> is not valid
You need to specify hosts to follow.
If you confirm, you will send a follow request to: -
Do you really want to unfollow <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ host }}"/>?
You are not following <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ host }}"/> anymore.
Do you really want to delete this user?
Do you really want to remove this video from the blacklist ? It will be available again in the videos list.
Video <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ name }}"/> removed from the blacklist.
The new password and the confirmed password do not correspond.
Video channel <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ videoChannelName }}"/> created.
Video channel <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ videoChannelName }}"/> updated.
Do you really want to delete <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ videoChannelName }}"/>? It will delete all videos uploaded in this channel too.
Please type the name of the video channel to confirm
Cannot retrieve OAuth Client credentials: <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ errorText }}"/>.
Ensure you have correctly configured PeerTube (config/ directory), in particular the "webserver" section.
An email with the reset password instructions will be sent to <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ email }}"/>.
Unable to find user id or verification string.
Your password has been successfully reset!
All unsaved data will be lost, are you sure you want to leave this page?
Request is too large for the server. Please contact you administrator if you want to increase the limit size.
Too many attempts, please try again after <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ minutesLeft }}"/> minutes.
Too many attempts, please try again later.
Registration for <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ username }}"/> complete.
<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ seconds }}"/> of full HD videos
<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ seconds }}"/> of HD videos
<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ seconds }}"/> of average quality videos
Your video was uploaded in your account and is private.
But associated data (tags, description...) will be lost, are you sure you want to leave this page?
Your video is not uploaded yet, are you sure you want to leave this page?
We are sorry but PeerTube cannot handle videos > 4GB

Your video quota is exceeded with this video (video size: <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ videoSize }}"/>, used: <x id="INTERPOLATION_1" equiv-text="{{ videoQuotaUsed }}"/>, quota: <x id="INTERPOLATION_2" equiv-text="{{ videoQuota }}"/>)
<x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ totalReplies }}"/> replies will be deleted too.
Do you really want to blacklist this video?
Video <x id="INTERPOLATION" equiv-text="{{ videoName }}"/> had been blacklisted.
Do you really want to delete this video?
